alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Erie and northwestern Crawford Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Albion, or 12 miles northwest of Meadville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Harmonsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Riceville, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville and Lake City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
